originalText.text: Paid high interest loan off early. And did not receive my 5 percent discount I was promised. If you don't want to go out of business don't take the money. All these people care about is themselves. But Brandon was professional at his job. But their loans hurt my business more than help it

originalText.text:
These guys are great. Very fast and high approval amounts.

Need to skip a payment? No problem, just email them.

Need a little more money? Shoot them a couple bank statements and it’ll be in your account in a few hours.

Need to push a payment back a few days? Email them. I’ve gotten replies at 10pm at night.

This is the only lender that actually provides flexibility and can work with YOUR schedule.

Mike is the guy you need to speak to.

They are fast and very aggressive. Appreciate it!

originalText.text: These reviews are fake they have lol. This company is a legal scam and will ruin your entire life . I hope no one makes the mistake me and others have made . They will drain ur account dry the money sounds nice when ur in need. They will put liens on all ur accounts and and lock them completely out and freeze ur money . Terrible company and will not return calls or emails don’t waist ur time. Worst company ever ! Believe me .

originalText.text: Stay clear of this company. They will bug you with phone calls until you respond to their offer and then after you fill out the app you never hear from them, nor will they answer their phone. Plus they ask for a canceled check AND your online banking info with your password. REALLY????? Like I'm falling for that..... my bank is  on notice with this company.  BEWARE SCAMMERS

originalText.text: As a small business we have worked with CFGMS this past year and have been appreciative for their support of our business and willingness to work with our circumstances. Specifically, Peter has been our representative and has been very responsive, transparent and resourceful. In addition as our business is growing, Peter has taken an active interest in our work and evolution!
